subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Adam Scott shot a scrambling par 71 for a two-shot victory and a successful defense of his Australian Masters title, and Matt Kuchar double-bogeyed the 18th to finish second.
snippet: Adam Scott shot a scrambling par 71 for a two-shot victory and a successful defense of his Australian Masters title, and Matt Kuchar double-bogeyed the 18th to finish second.
